title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2081/84 of 19 July 1984 derogating in respect of the opening weeks of the 1984/85 marketing year from the quality standards applicable to certain varieties of apples and pears
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2081/84
of 19 July 1984
derogating in respect of the opening weeks of the 1984/85 marketing year from the quality standards applicable to certain varieties of apples and pears
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 July 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
